title: Bug 7581ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly.
EB: The expected behavior is that the combo box should always be the width of the property sheet column. It should work the same as the DialogCellEditor where the button is always visible. You will need to investigate to determine if this is an issue with us or SWT.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Edit a cell that uses ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the combo box does not size correctly.

Expected result:
- The combo box should always be the width of the property sheet column.

Actual result:
- The combo box does not size correctly.
